languages.text: While this creature is alive, the Necron Immortal gains +1 stack of energy integration at the start of its every {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: While this creature is alive, the Necron Immortal gains +1 stack of energy integration at the start of its every turn.

languages.text: Пока это существо живо, некрон-бессмертный получает +1 уровень "интеграции энергии" в начале каждого своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}.
languages.original_text: While this creature is alive, the Necron Immortal gains +1 stack of energy integration at the start of its every {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Пока это существо живо, некрон-бессмертный получает +1 уровень "интеграции энергии" в начале каждого своего хода.
Пока это существо живо, некрон-бессмертный получает +1 уровень "интеграции энергии" в начале каждого своего хода.

languages.text: この生物が生きているかぎり、ネクロン・イモータルは毎{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時にエネルギー統合を+1スタック得る。
languages.original_text: While this creature is alive, the Necron Immortal gains +1 stack of energy integration at the start of its every {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: この生物が生きているかぎり、ネクロン・イモータルは毎ターン開始時にエネルギー統合を1スタック得る。

languages.text: 当此生物存活时，太空死灵不朽者每{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时都会获得1层“能量融合”效果。
languages.original_text: While this creature is alive, the Necron Immortal gains +1 stack of energy integration at the start of its every {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 当此生物存活时，太空死灵不朽者每回合开始时都会获得1层“能量融合”效果。

languages.text: Mientras esta criatura esté viva, el Inmortal Necrón gana +1 acumulación de Integración energética al principio de cada {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}.
languages.original_text: While this creature is alive, the Necron Immortal gains +1 stack of energy integration at the start of its every {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Mientras esta criatura esté viva, el Inmortal Necrón gana +1 acumulación de Integración energética al principio de cada turno.

languages.text: Während diese Kreatur am Leben ist, erhält der Necron-Unsterbliche zu Beginn jedes seiner {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Züge{/g} +1 Stapel "Energieintegration".
languages.original_text: While this creature is alive, the Necron Immortal gains +1 stack of energy integration at the start of its every {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Während diese Kreatur am Leben ist, erhält der Necron-Unsterbliche +1 Stapel Energieintegration zu Beginn jedes eigenen Zuges.

languages.text: Tant que cette créature est en vie, l'Immortel nécron bénéficie de +1 cumul d'Intégration d'énergie au début de chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}.
languages.original_text: While this creature is alive, the Necron Immortal gains +1 stack of energy integration at the start of its every {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Tant que cette créature est en vie, l'Immortel Nécron bénéficie de +1 cumul d'Intégration d'Énergie au début de chaque tour.

languages.text: Bu yaratık hayattayken Layemut Nekron, {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turu{/g} her başladığında +1 enerji entegrasyonu birikimi kazanır.
languages.original_text: While this creature is alive, the Necron Immortal gains +1 stack of energy integration at the start of its every {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
